title: AI Query Interface - Text Query in English
description: Verify that the AI query interface accepts text input in English and returns accurate AI-generated responses within 2 seconds.

steps.description: Navigate to the AI Query Interface page.
Enter a valid farming-related query in English in the text input field.
Submit the query.
Verify that a relevant AI-generated answer is returned within 2 seconds.

title: AI Query Interface - Text Query in Malayalam
description: Verify that the AI query interface accepts text input in Malayalam language and returns accurate AI-generated responses within 2 seconds.

steps.description: Navigate to the AI Query Interface page.
Enter a valid farming-related query in Malayalam in the text input field.
Submit the query.
Verify that a relevant AI-generated answer in Malayalam is returned within 2 seconds.

title: AI Query Interface - Voice Input in English
description: Verify that users can submit farming-related queries via voice input in English and receive accurate responses timely.

steps.description: Navigate to the AI Query Interface page.
Activate voice input and speak a farming-related query in English.
Submit the voice query.
Verify that a relevant AI-generated answer is displayed within 2 seconds.

title: AI Query Interface - Voice Input in Malayalam
description: Verify that users can submit farming-related queries via voice input in Malayalam and receive accurate responses timely.

steps.description: Navigate to the AI Query Interface page.
Activate voice input and speak a farming-related query in Malayalam.
Submit the voice query.
Verify that a relevant AI-generated answer in Malayalam is displayed within 2 seconds.

title: Image Upload for Plant Disease Diagnosis - Valid Image
description: Verify that uploading a clear image of a plant returns a valid disease diagnosis from the AI with high accuracy.

steps.description: Navigate to the Image Analysis feature.
Upload a clear, correctly oriented image of a diseased plant.
Submit the image for analysis.
Verify that the system returns an accurate disease diagnosis with relevant details.

title: Image Upload for Plant Disease Diagnosis - Invalid Image Format
description: Verify that uploading an unsupported image format prompts an appropriate error message and no analysis is done.

steps.description: Navigate to the Image Analysis feature.
Attempt to upload an unsupported or corrupted file (e.g., .txt or corrupted image).
Verify the system rejects the file and displays a user-friendly error message.

title: Image Capture Using WebRTC Camera Integration
description: Verify that the camera integration allows users to capture plant images directly within the app and submit for disease diagnosis.

steps.description: Allow camera permissions when prompted.
Use the WebRTC camera interface to capture an image of a plant.
Submit the captured image for disease analysis.
Verify that the system returns the disease diagnosis result successfully.

title: Real-time Weather Data Display and Alerts
description: Verify that the application displays current weather data for Kerala, updates in real-time, and triggers weather alerts correctly.

steps.description: Open the Weather Integration section from the app.
Verify current weather conditions match the data from OpenWeatherMap API for Kerala.
Simulate a weather alert and verify the application displays an alert notification.

title: Notification System for Weather and Farming Tips
description: Verify that browser notifications for weather alerts and farming tips are delivered promptly and allow user interaction.

steps.description: Grant browser permissions to receive notifications.
Trigger a weather alert event in the backend.
Verify that a browser notification is displayed with correct alert message.
Trigger a farming tip notification from the agricultural calendar.
Verify that the farming tip notification is displayed and clickable if applicable.

title: Agricultural Calendar - Seasonal and Crop-specific Guidance
description: Verify that the agricultural calendar displays correct seasonal farming guidance and daily tips, and updates according to crop selection.

steps.description: Navigate to the Agricultural Calendar page.
Select different crops and seasons.
Verify that the calendar shows relevant crop-specific guidance and updated daily tips according to selections.

title: PDF Knowledge Base - Integration and Query Enhancement
description: Verify that the system integrates PDF agricultural documents and enhances AI query responses using retrieval augmented generation.

steps.description: Submit an agricultural query related to information covered in included PDFs.
Verify the AI response contains information derived from the PDF knowledge base for improved accuracy.

title: Crop Calculator - Profit Estimation Accuracy
description: Verify that the crop calculator accurately calculates profit estimates based on user input for crop choice, costs, and expected yield.

steps.description: Navigate to the Crop Calculator tool.
Input valid values for crop type, planting area, cost, and expected yield.
Submit the inputs.
Verify that the displayed profit estimate matches the expected calculated result.

title: Expert Network - Connecting with Agricultural Officers
description: Verify that farmers can connect and interact with agricultural officers via the Expert Network feature.

steps.description: Navigate to the Expert Network page.
Attempt to search and contact an agricultural officer.
Verify that contact requests or messages are sent and received properly.

title: Community Hub - Farmer Networking and Support
description: Verify that farmers can join discussions, post queries, and respond to others in the Community Hub.

steps.description: Navigate to the Community Hub page.
Post a new topic or question related to farming.
Submit the post.
Reply to an existing post.
Verify all posts and replies appear correctly and are persistent.

title: Multilingual Support Consistency Across Application
description: Verify that all UI elements, notifications, AI responses, and help content appear correctly in both English and Malayalam when language is switched.

steps.description: Switch the application language from English to Malayalam.
Verify all UI texts, buttons, notifications, and help/support content are translated and displayed properly.
Switch back from Malayalam to English.
Verify UI returns to English correctly with all elements visible.

title: Responsive Design Verification on Desktop and Mobile
description: Verify that the interface is fully responsive and functional across common desktop browsers and mobile devices using Tailwind CSS.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Edge).
Verify UI elements are correctly laid out, navigation works, and no overlap or broken content exists.
Open the application on mobile devices and mobile browser emulators.
Verify touch interface is responsive, navigation menus collapse properly, and no content is clipped or inaccessible.

title: Error Handling - Backend API Failure During Query Processing
description: Verify that the application shows an appropriate error message if the backend API fails or is unreachable when submitting AI queries.

steps.description: Simulate backend API unavailability or failure.
Submit an AI query.
Verify the application displays a user-friendly error notification without crashing.

title: Help & Support - Access and Multilingual Assistance
description: Verify that users can access the help and support system at any point, and receive assistance in both English and Malayalam.

steps.description: Access the Help & Support section from various pages.
Verify help content and FAQ displays in selected language.
Switch language and verify help content updates accordingly.

title: Crop Calculator - Handling Invalid Input Data
description: Verify that the crop calculator handles invalid or missing input data gracefully with clear error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the Crop Calculator.
Input invalid values such as negative numbers, letters in numeric fields, or leave required fields blank.
Attempt to calculate profit.
Verify appropriate validation error messages appear that guide correct input.

title: Security - Prevent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in User Inputs
description: Verify that all user inputs in query text, community posts, and expert network messages are sanitized to prevent XSS attacks.

steps.description: Enter input containing HTML/script tags in AI query, community posts, and expert messages.
Submit each input.
Verify that displayed output escapes or removes scripts preventing code execution or UI break.

title: Performance - AI Response Time Under Load
description: Verify that AI query responses maintain sub-2-second response times when multiple simultaneous requests are made.

steps.description: Simulate multiple (10+) simultaneous AI queries from different users or sessions.
Verify all AI responses complete within 2 seconds without errors.
